case.title: Young, Kinky Submissive for Powerful Dominant - m4w - 50 (NYC/Long Island)
case.text: I am a strong, successful, powerful dominant man. I require submissive young ladies with an intense desire to please and to have boundaries pushed and exploded. I am physically and mentally imposing and in complete control-- unlike any other man out here. You must be real and ready to serve---no nonsense or time wasting! Put "serve" in your response or it will be thrown away
